item.description: Join us at Gayle's Thyme to get the group moving again! We will start with introductions and a general discussion about paganism then start planning the rest of the year! Refreshments will be served. All levels invited to attend from beginner to the more advanced. Contact Gayle at 860-763-5206 for directions and to offer suggestions for topics.
item.name: Open Discussion: Topic to be announced at the meeting
